name: Crazy Contraptions
description: Crazy Contraptions is game of building complex Rube Goldberg like contraptions to move a ball from start to finish and score points. However, getting the ball to the goal isn't enough, your ball will earn more points for each piece of the contraption it touches. You will have to use an array of parts including cannons, magnets, portals, and even hamster powered wheels to score as many points as possible.  While you are doing this you will also be competing against an opponent to see who can score the most points in the time limit. This game is full of fast paced action, careful strategy, and of course crazy contraptions.
